text: Amid uproar over reported removal of mail collection boxes, Postmaster General Louis DeJoy says, "this is a normal process that's been around 50 year," but adds, "when I found out about it...I decided to stop it, and we'll pick it up after the election." https://t.co/kbcneK4URN https://t.co/GFUA1XQNNA
